responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "7EA1E2ED42073AFEE04B3F851AE3470E", "The Puritans of the secretive order believed in their own revised translations of the Kyronu Oath. They believed they were guided by the lingering light of the demi-god and given sacred formulas to combat most plagues. It is known that Kyron Rodin Mung, The Night Reaper, of the order was one of the greatest alchemists of his age and helped procure elixirs, salves and ointments to combat plagues. He is beleived to have crafted a Puritan Potion that kept his knights safe during the great Raven Plage of 2201. (Damage) taken to his grave. (Damage) ")
name: MIDD_0016_TPP_Book_KyronicHistory_7
